questions.question: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

answers.answer: The best book I've ever read in my life is the Holy Quran because it is the book i've ever read completely. It is full of love, forgiveness, and pity. The words of God are the most wonderful words in the world. The Holy Quran learns to us a full of qualities. To pray god and love our human brothers and all kind of life on the planet. It is learn to us the rules to live together in peace and respect of eachother.that is why I love this book.
